archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Assign Task
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: The Assign Task process is responsible for assigning manual activities, described by work items (components of work orders), to assignable staff within the enterprise and/or third parties.

properties.value: The association of a work item with a technician who is assigned to this work is a task, or, task assignment is a work item assignment to a particular performer.
